Where to look for the descriptor configs
whodoesthat.configuration.generate_on_co: If enabled the data will be generated every time one of the descriptor configs is changed
whodoesthat.configuration.generate_on_st: If enabled and there are newer mods than the last generation, the data will be generated on startup
whodoesthat.configuration.json_target.to: In which file to store the full data as JSON
whodoesthat.configuration.yaml_target.to: In which file to store the minified data as YAML
whodoesthat.configuration.csv_target.too: In which file to store a summary table as CSV
whodoesthat.configuration.generate_now.t: Runs the analysis and saves the results
whodoesthat.configuration.show.tooltip: Opens the screen with the last analysis results
whodoesthat.configuration.paths.tooltip: Configure where the results files are stored
whodoesthat.configuration.actions.toolti: Configure when the analysis is run automatically
List of mods to ignore during analysis
